title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 199: Featuring Nate Thompson + Brendan Gallagher
description:
On this week's episode of Spittin' Chiclets, the guys are joined by a pair of Montreal Canadiens. Nate Thompson joins the fellas to talk about some funny stories from early in his career, then some interesting topics like his religion, meditating and his sobriety. Then the guys are joined by Brendan Gallagher, who discusses his time filming Biz Nasty Does BC, Carey Price, His Dad and more. The guys also touch on some NHL news including some retirements and the current RFA situation in the NHL.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
